name: Deepweb
body:
### Deepweb proxy
Deepweb is a tool for easy browsing deep web. Currently we provide a Proxy auto-config for this purpose, on my [linode](https://www.linode.com/?r=cc93760c5a1b11a4d9c06ecfa4483bcce3d8f1e1), providing a deep web gateway. 

### How to use
Set your browser (or system) proxy to PAC URL: http://liruqi.github.io/deepweb/dw.pac

### Security
* Currently we only proxy for .onion domains.
* We do not record anything, but the link from end user to my gateway is un-secure. use https.
* Get what you need to know. Do not trust anyone in deep web.

### Support or Contact
Mail me: liruqi@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
